metadata.title: CVE-2021-39923 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Large loop in the PNRP dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.9 and 3.2.0 to3.2.17 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capturefile

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
